pull.title: [Wallet] Reduce minTxFee for transaction creation to 1000 satoshis
pull.body: Make minTxFee match minRelayTxFee one year after #3305

events.message: [Wallet] Reduce minTxFee for transaction creation to 1000 satoshis

issue.title: [Qt] Add Smartfee to GUI
issue.body:
By default a minimized label is shown. It updates automatically, if smartfee has been chosen.
![smartfeegui1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/4878732/5f153366-6317-11e4-8733-74bf9d78c892.png)
Smartfee not initialized -> pay minfee
![smartfeegui2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/4878731/5f136a90-6317-11e4-97d8-04f8378c44a4.png)
Smartfee initialized
![smartfeegui4](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/4878730/5f117802-6317-11e4-8341-296896b15a5f.png)
![smartfeegui3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/4878733/5f165688-6317-11e4-8b11-cc46555bd0a4.png)
![smartfeegui5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/4878735/5f1c6316-6317-11e4-9794-a6e0a3497b45.png)
![smartfeegui6](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/4878734/5f1662c2-6317-11e4-9c79-4048a205e0de.png)
![smartfeegui7](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/4878736/5f2b3b2a-6317-11e4-9a4e-92c2c3547942.png)
Fee removed from optionsdialog
![smartfeegui9](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2814559/4878737/5f316590-6317-11e4-9725-1f2c13ebdaec.png)

events.body: #3305 only changed the minimum relay fee. I'm not sure anyone would mine transactions using fees this low...
As far as I can tell transactions with fees down to the minimum relay fee are typically confirmed within 3 blocks (70-80%) and almost always confirmed within 8 blocks (over 99%).

Miners judge by the minimum relay fee,
see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/037b4f1485404a69f96ac6c448a97d21315c8663#diff-4a59b408ad3778278c3aeffa7da33c3c
Wow, that snuck in with absolutely no discussion as to the policy change it was affecting... :/

Can we have some ACKs/NACKs here?
@gavinandresen @sipa @gmaxwell
Relying on the numbers above, utACK.

This is just a default and can be configured by wallet users, right?
If so, utACK.

I don't have a strong opinion.  I think we made an error lowering the relay fee previously, but fortunately no doom has yet come with it.  Since reports claim the lower amounts are confirming in sane times it seems okay to me.
